name: One Dreamer
description:
One Dreamer: Prologue is available
here
Help Frank, a burnt out indie game developer, rediscover his love for video games while struggling to release his debut title. Reprogram objects, fix bugs and solve coding puzzles as you journey through the English voiced story of One Dreamer.
A narrative-driven, English voiced story about the gruelling development process behind making an indie game.Explore a wide range of atmospheric areas using 2.5D movement and a unique 360° section system.Realistic, but easy to understand pseudocode puzzles based on C#. Edit over 100 snippets of code from Frank's toaster to playable mini-games.Beautiful original soundtrack composed over a period of 5 years.
